Description: Schecter Guitar Research Hellraiser Deluxe Electric Guitar Hellraiser Deluxe electric GuitarThe mahogany body is capped with figured maple, finished in crimson burst, and bound in black. The 3-piece mahogany neck plays super fast and smoothRosewood fretboard and 24 jumbo frets for effortless bendingDeluxe guitar has a pair of high-output EMG active humbuckersEMG-81 in the bridge and an 85 in the neck, for searing leads and tight sledgehammer riffs. The Schecter guitar features mother-of-pearl crescent inlays that run the length of the fretboard, coming together in a unique 12th fret pattern that you just have to see to appreciateFinally, the Tune-o-matic-style bridge and thru-body stringing ensure singing sustain.FeaturesMahogany Classic Body with black binding3-piece mahogany neck with rosewood fingerboardSchecter Ultra Access contour25-1/2″ scale24 jumbo fretsGraphTech Tusq nutMother-of-pearl crescentsEMG Active 81/85 humbuckersSchecter Tune-o-matic-style bridgeGrover tunersBlack hardware This guitar has been refurbished by MIRC. It is lightly stamped “2” and “used” on the back of the headstock, and a new serial number applied to prevent the guitar from being sold as new factory stock. That being said, this guitar is about as close to new as “used” can get! Everything works, plays, and sounds as it should. There is a finish blemish that can be seen in the pics. Other than that, this guitar is in perfect condition and plays beautifully! You WON’T be disappointed!Guitar retails for $499.00Free shipping in continental US.
